document.full_text: bahrain's foreign minister said on monday it was "completely untrue" that kuwait would mediate to resolve the country's political crisis, a reaction leading opposition group wefaq said augured badly for any resolution.
document.title: bahrain denies kuwait to mediate in political crisis
lines_and_colors: bahrain's foreign minister said on monday it was "completely untrue" that kuwait would mediate to resolve the country's political crisis, a reaction leading opposition group wefaq said augured badly for any resolution.
